00019 namespace glm
00020 {
00021     template <typename T> 
00022     inline _xvec3<T> closestPointOnLine(const _xvec3<T>& point, const _xvec3<T>& a, const _xvec3<T>& b)
00023     {
00024         T LineLength = glm::distance(a, b);
00025         glm::_xvec3<T> Vector = point - a;
00026         glm::_xvec3<T> LineDirection = (b - a) / LineLength;
00027 
00028         // Project Vector to LineDirection to get the distance of point from a
00029         T Distance = glm::dot(Vector, LineDirection);
00030 
00031         if(Distance <= 0) return a;
00032         if(Distance >= LineLength) return b;
00033         return a + LineDirection * Distance;
00034     }
00035 }
